mapper.select: SELECT svr.sales_volume_rule_id as salesVolumeRuleId, t1.item_key_id as itemKeyId, t1.item_key_ratio as itemKeyRatio, svr.min_sales_volume as minSalesVolume, svr.max_sales_volume as maxSalesVolume FROM bison.sales_volume_rule svr, (select sales_volume_rule_id, item_key_id, item_key_ratio from bison.sales_volume_rule_item_key_rel where item_key_id = #{itemKeyId}) t1 where svr.sales_volume_rule_id in (t1.sales_volume_rule_id)

SELECT sales_volume_rule_id as salesVolumeRuleId, item_key_id as itemKeyId FROM bison.sales_volume_rule where item_key_id = #{itemKeyId} and (min_sales_volume < #{lastUnitsOrderSum} and #{lastUnitsOrderSum} <= max_sales_volume )
